vote.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of bedding plants, seed, sod, and trees for city wide use - SRH Trees, Inc. in the estimated amount of $2,120,043, Justin Seed Company Inc. in the estimated amount of $47,170, and The Letco Group, LLC dba Living Earth in the estimated amount of $31,753, lowest responsible bidders of three - Total estimated amount of $2,198,966 - Financing:  General Fund ($996,918), Storm Water Operations Fund ($1,139,513), Bond Administration Fund ($43,000), and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($19,535)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of bedding plants, seed, sod, and trees for city wide use - SRH Trees, Inc. in the estimated amount of $2,120,043, Justin Seed Company Inc. in the estimated amount of $47,170, and The Letco Group, LLC dba Living Earth in the estimated amount of $31,753, lowest responsible bidders of three - Total estimated amount of $2,198,966 - Financing:  General Fund ($996,918), Storm Water Operations Fund ($1,139,513), Bond Administration Fund ($43,000), and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($19,535)
